text:
Name: The Loire Valley between Sully-sur-Loire and Chalonnes. short_description:

The Loire Valley is an outstanding cultural landscape of great beauty, containing historic towns and villages, great architectural monuments (the ch√¢teaux), and cultivated lands formed by many centuries of interaction between their population and the physical environment, primarily the river Loire itself.
